href=\"/\"><img src=\"/static/images/logo.svg\"></a>\n    <div class=\"mobileMenuInner\">\n      <ul>\n        <li><a href=\"/features/\">Designed for Families</a></li>\n        <li><a </div>\n</header>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nfunction toggleMobileMenu(open) {\n  if (open) {\n    document.getElementsByTagName(\"header\")[0].classList.add(\"mobileMenuOpen\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").classList.add(\"open\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").removeEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n  }\n  else {\n    document.getElementsByTagName(\"header\")[0].classList.remove(\"mobileMenuOpen\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").classList.remove(\"open\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").removeEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\n  }\n}\ndocument.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\ndocument.getElementById(\"mobileMenuBG\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n</script>\n\n    <div id=\"wrapper\">\n  <section id=\"hero\">\n    <div>\n      <h1>Find Everything Going <span>On For Kids in</span><span><span id=\"area-dynamic-container\"><span class=\"area-dynamic\"><span style=\"transform: translateY(-21%);\">Aberdeen</span></span><span class=\"area-dynamic\"><span style=\"transform: translateY(65%);\">Bath</span></span></span><p id=\"cities-link\" class=\"cities-modal-link\">Where we cover</p></span></h1>\n\n      <div class=\"store-buttons\">\n  <a href=\"https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/hoop/id996073365\" onclick=\"ga('send', 'event', 'Click Out', 'Install App', 'iOS');fbq('trackCustom', 'StoreConversion');\"><img class=\"store-button badge-apple\" src=\"/static/images/badge-apple.svg\"></a><a href=\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.hoop.android\" onclick=\"ga('send', 'event', 'Click Out', 'Install App', 'Android');\"><img class=\" badge-google\" src=\"/static/images/badge-google.svg\"></a>\n</div>\n\n      <h3>– Best of the App Store 2016 –</h3>\n    </div>\n  </section>\n\n  <section id=\"reviews\" class=\"block\">\n  <h2>Families Love Hoop</h2>\n\n  <div class=\"columns\">\n    <div>\n      <h3>Must-Have App For Parents</h3>\n      <p>Seriously, tell every parent you&nbsp;know</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <div>\n and&nbsp;hassle</p>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</section>\n\n\n  <section class=\"block\">\n    <h2>What’s On For Your Kids</h2>\n\n    <div id=\"features\" class=\"columns\">\n      <div>\n        <h3>Discover Fun Things To Do</h3>\n        <p>Hoop lists every family friendly event and activity happening across town.</p>\n      </div>\n\n      <div>\n        <h3>Free Events &amp; Activities</h3>\n        <p>Quickly uncover thousands of fab free things going on.</p>\n      </div>\n\n      <div>\n        <h3>Designed for your family</h3>\n        <p>Only see things happening suitable for the age of your children.</p>\n      </div>\n\n      <p><a href=\"/features/\">Learn More</a></p>\n    </div>\n  </section>\n\n  <section class=\"block\" id=\"press\">\n  <h2>As seen in</h2>\n\n  <ul>\n    <li>The Telegraph</li>\n    <li>Huffington Post</li>\n    <li>Evening Standard</li>\n    <li>Metro</li>\n    <li>The Sunday Times</li>\n  </ul>\n</section>\n\n  <section id=\"download\">\n  <h2>What’s on for kids</h2>\n  <h3>– Best of the App Store 2016 –</h3>\n  <div class=\"store-buttons\">\n  <a href=\"https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/hoop/id996073365\" href=\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.hoop.android\" onclick=\"ga('send', 'event', 'Click Out', 'Install App', 'Android');\"><img class=\" badge-google\" src=\"/static/images/badge-google.svg\"></a>\n</div>\n\n</section>\n\n  <div id=\"cities-modal\">\n  <div class=\"container\">\n    <div class=\"innerContainer\">\n      <img id=\"close-modal\" src=\"/static/images/home/icon-close.svg\">\n      <h1>Hoop is currently available in...</h1>\n      <ul id=\"cities-list\">\n        \n      <li>Aberdeen</li><li>Bath</li><li>Birmingham</li><li>Brighton</li><li>Bristol</li><li>Cardiff</li><li>Dundee</li><li>Edinburgh</li><li>Essex</li><li>Gateshead</li><li>Glasgow</li><li>Kent</li><li>Leeds</li><li>Liverpool</li><li>London</li><li>Manchester</li><li>Newcastle</li><li>North Tyneside</li><li>Nottingham</li><li>Oxford</li><li>Sheffield</li><li>South Tyneside</li><li>Sunderland</li><li>Swansea</li><li>Wakefield</li></ul>\n      <p>Coming to more areas soon!</p>\n      <a href=\"https://docs.google.com/a/hoop.co.uk/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSchvhMtFezjUAIvAEjcxpCoebpruqjrN7VGsfXKAwBB46DqxA/viewform\">Vote for your area</a>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</div>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nfunction scrollbarWidth() {\n  var tempEl = document.createElement(\"div\");\n  tempEl.style.cssText = 'width:100px;height:100px;overflow:scroll !important;position:absolute;top:-9999px';\n  document.body.appendChild(tempEl);\n  var scrollWidth = tempEl.offsetWidth - tempEl.clientWidth;\n  document.body.removeChild(tempEl);\n  return scrollWidth;\n}\n\nfunction toggleModal(event, open) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n  if (open) {\n    document.body.setAttribute(\"style\", \"padding-right: \"+scrollbarWidth()+\"px; overflow-y: hidden;\");\n    document.getElementsByTagName('header')[0].setAttribute(\"style\", \"margin-left: -\"+(scrollbarWidth() / 2.0)+\"px;\");\n    document.getElementById(\"cities-modal\").classList.add(\"open\");\n  }\n  else {\n    document.getElementById(\"cities-modal\").classList.remove(\"open\");\n    document.body.setAttribute(\"style\", \"\");\n    document.getElementsByTagName('header')[0].setAttribute(\"style\", \"\");\n  }\n}\nvar linkElements = document.getElementsByClassName(\"cities-modal-link\");\nfor (i = 0; i < linkElements.length; i++) {\n  linkElements[i].addEventListener(\"click\", function(e) {toggleModal(e, true);}, false);\n}\ndocument.getElementById(\"close-modal\").addEventListener(\"click\", function(e) {toggleModal(e, false);}, false);\n\nvar citiesList = [];\n\nfunction setModalCities() {\n  var citiesListEl = document.getElementById(\"cities-list\");\n  for(var i = 0; i < citiesList.length; i++) {\n    var cityElement = document.createElement(\"li\");\n    cityElement.innerHTML = citiesList[i];\n    citiesListEl.appendChild(cityElement);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction City(name, initPos) {\n  this.pos = initPos-15;\n  this.el = this.makeElement(name);\n};\n\nCity.prototype.clearCities = function() {\n  var els = document.getElementsByClassName('area-dynamic');\n  while (els.length > 0) {\n    els[0].parentNode.removeChild(els[0]);\n  }\n}\n\nCity.prototype.makeElement = function(name) {\n  var el = document.createElement('span');\n  el.classList.add('area-dynamic');\n  var innerEl = document.createElement('span');\n  innerEl.innerHTML = name;\n  el.appendChild(innerEl);\n  return el;\n};\n\nCity.prototype.move = function(dt, offset) {\n  var frame = dt - offset;\n  if (frame < -25) {\n    this.pos = this.pos - (((frame+25)/-100.0));\n  }\n  else if (frame > 0) {\n    this.pos = this.pos - ((frame)/50.0);\n  }\n  this.el.firstChild.style.webkitTransform = 'translateY('+ this.pos.toString() +'%)';\n  this.el.firstChild.style.MozTransform = 'translateY('+ this.pos.toString() +'%)';\n  this.el.firstChild.style.msTransform = 'translateY('+ this.pos.toString() +'%)';\n  this.el.firstChild.style.OTransform = 'translateY('+ this.pos.toString() +'%)';\n  this.el.firstChild.style.transform = 'translateY('+ this.pos.toString() +'%)';\n};\n\nCity.prototype.mount = function() {\n  document.getElementById(\"area-dynamic-container\").appendChild(this.el);\n}\n\nfunction startHeaderAnimation() {\n  if (!document.getElementById(\"area-dynamic-container\")) {return;}\n  var firstCity = new City(citiesList[0], 0);\n  var secondCityStartOffset = 113;\n  var secondCity = new City(citiesList[1], secondCityStartOffset);\n  var cityIndex = 2;\n  var dt = 0;\n  firstCity.mount();\n  secondCity.mount();\n  var id = setInterval(showCity, 15);\n\n  function showCity() {\n    if (cityIndex % citiesList.length === 0) {cityIndex = 0;}\n    if (dt >= 175) {\n      City.prototype.clearCities();\n      dt = 0;\n      firstCity = secondCity;\n      secondCity = new City(citiesList[cityIndex], secondCityStartOffset);\n      cityIndex++;\n      firstCity.mount();\n      secondCity.mount();\n    }\n    dt++;\n    firstCity.move(dt, 0);\n    secondCity.move(dt, 175);\n  }\n}\n\nfetch('/api/areas/').then(function(res) {\n  return res.json();\n}).then(function(cities) {\n  citiesList = cities.items;\n  setModalCities();\n  startHeaderAnimation();\n}).catch(function(err) {\n  citiesList = ['London', 'Bristol', 'Bath', 'Oxford', 'Brighton & Hove', 'Manchester', 'Liverpool'];\n  setModalCities();\n  startHeaderAnimation();\n})\n\n</script>\n\n</div>\n    <footer>\n      <div class=\"footer-top\">\n        <div class=\"footer-top-container\">\n          <img src=\"/static/images/icon.svg\">\n          <ul id=\"menu\">\n            <li><a href=\"/organisers/\">Get Your Activity Listed</a></li>\n href=\"https://medium.com/hoop-rolling\">Hoop Rolling</a></li>\n          </ul>\n          <ul id=\"contact\">\n            <li><a href=\"https://twitter.com/hoop\"><img })(window,document,'script','/static/js/analytics.160630.js','ga');\n      ga('create', 'UA-58640664-1', 'auto');\n      ga('send', 'pageview');\n\n      \n  </script>\n\n\n    \n  <script>\n document,'script','/static/js/fbevents.160630.js');\n\n    fbq('init', '597121073797234');\n    fbq('track', 'PageView');\n  </script>\n  <noscript>&lt;img height=\"1\" width=\"1\" style=\"display:none\" src=\"https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=597121073797234&amp;ev=PageView&amp;noscript=1\" /&gt;</noscript>\n\n\n  </head>\n  <body class=\"error desktop\">\n    <header>\n  <div </div>\n</header>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nfunction toggleMobileMenu(open) {\n  if (open) {\n    document.getElementsByTagName(\"header\")[0].classList.add(\"mobileMenuOpen\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").classList.add(\"open\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").removeEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n  }\n  else {\n    document.getElementsByTagName(\"header\")[0].classList.remove(\"mobileMenuOpen\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").classList.remove(\"open\");\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").removeEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n    document.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\n  }\n}\ndocument.getElementById(\"hamburger\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(true);}, false);\ndocument.getElementById(\"mobileMenuBG\").addEventListener(\"click\", function() {toggleMobileMenu(false);}, false);\n</script>\n\n    <div id=\"wrapper\">\n    <div id=\"content\">\n        <h1>whoops…</h1>\n        <p>The page you are looking for cannot be found.</p>\n    </div>\n</div>\n    <footer>\n      <div class=\"footer-top\">\n        <div class=\"footer-top-container\">\n
